thread.title: The cult pan loved by Gwyneth Paltrow just dropped in price for Black Friday
thread.title_full: The cult pan loved by Gwyneth Paltrow just dropped in price for Black Friday

author: Rachel Weisz
title: The cult pan loved by Gwyneth Paltrow just dropped in price for Black Friday
text:
morehere
The internet’s most famous pan just went on sale for Black Friday 2025. Our Place, the cookware brand beloved for its stylish, non-toxic, and multi-use designs, has launched its biggest sale of the year, with major discounts across its entire site.
Founded with the goal of simplifying home cooking, Our Place quickly became a viral sensation thanks to the Always Pan, and is loved by celebrities such as Selena Gomez, Cameron Diaz and Gwyneth Paltrow (it’s Goop-approved!). Gomez previously collaborated with the brand back in 2022, helping cement its cult status.
Explore our Black Friday 2025 guides below:
With over 28,000 five-star reviews, it’s clear fans are obsessed. One shopper wrote: “Life before my Our Place Always Pan? A dark, flavourless void. Life after? Pure culinary bliss. Seriously, don’t wait. Run, sprint, teleport – just get one.”
This year, the brand has slashed prices for Black Friday across its cookware, tableware, and baking essentials. The best offer so far is the 9-piece Titanium Pro Always Pan Trio, currently down by $341.
Described by the brand as its biggest sale of the year, the event offers the perfect opportunity to upgrade your cookware collection for less.
Keep scrolling to see our favourite picks from the Our Place Black Friday sale.
